title: Cannot upgrade skin shard
body: I've had a Headhunter Rengar skin shard for some time, and I'm interested in playing that champ these days, but, the shard icon doesn't offer the upgrade option, and it's outlined in orange. I have enough orange essense, and all of the other shards can be upgraded. Help?

replies.body:
Do you own the champion? You won't be able to upgrade the shard if you don't.

If you do own Rengar, and it's still not working, submit a ticket to Player Support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
